prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies both steel and flying elements with a futuristic design.
Generate a steel-type Pokemon featuring sharp edges and sleek metallic textures, resembling a spacecraft.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that combines technology and nature, with vibrant green accents and a streamlined body.
Make a legendary creature that has an ethereal appearance with a blend of metallic and natural colors.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a hybrid between a spaceship and a plant, with glowing features.
Design a creature with a sharp, angular body and bright green colors, soaring high in the skies.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the fusion of steel and nature, with an intricate and elegant design.
